name: SoulShake
description:
Purchase Notice

This is a horror game with no saved single player experience. You will walk through a terrifying abandoned hospital from a first person perspective, exploring its past and why you appeared in this abandoned hospital.
There are not many scary points in the game settings, so you can consider it as a walking simulator for an abandoned hospital.

story

After waking up, you were locked in the basement of a eerie abandoned hospital. You need to find a way to leave the hospital and understand why you appeared in the hospital.

Game Time

1 Hour to 1.5 Hours

Decrypt

The game decryption content is very simple. Follow the prompts to find the corresponding door key in order to get closer to the truth
